<S%H3427>"Stay<s%> with me, do not be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> for he <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> your <S%H5315>life;<s%> for you are <S%H4931>safe<s%> with me."
